ygData.subject: Re: Gordon finally responds
ygData.msgSnippet: ... * Kellin s Lucid Lullaby (15) - Resist rates so high that song is unusable. Level 50 bards get 50% resist rates on level 1 mobs. Resist rates for many sub
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it is in the thread. Copied from the thread:
--------------------
* Kellin's Lucid Lullaby (15) - Resist rates so high that song is
unusable. Level 50 bards get 50% resist rates on level 1 mobs. Resist
rates for many sub 30 bards well over 80%. Resist rates were more
reasonable prior to patch that added secondary resist check. Also,
the song affects pets on pvp servers. Also, the song is considered
higher than enchanter enthrall spell. Action: Look into resist rates
on song & adjust.
--------------------

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Bill Mann" <dabard@c...> wrote:
> Amen!
>
>
> >Haven't read the thread - but personally - I'm more concerned with
Lullaby
> >being looked at than any of the issues posted here...
> >
> >Slyde 41 of Xegony
